name: Eight (Demo)
description:
Eight is a narrative driven horror game, in which you play as a new home owner that is discovering the rich history of the house and its former inhabitants.

The game is currently in development and will release an alpha build on the 18th of September. There are parts that are not fully developed yet in the game, please be aware that bugs are currently still in place.

Controls:

W: walk forwards

A: walk to the left

S:  walk backwards

D: walk to the right

TAB: Open inventory

3: Turn on flashlight

M: Menu

Left Mouse Click: Interact/Pick up

Right Mouse Click: Inspect/Use
